summaries.title: Inec announce date for Adamawa, Kebbi states elections
summaries.description: According to Inec "All outstanding Govnorship, National and State Assembly supplementary elections go take place on Saturday 15 April 2023.
summaries.imageAlt: Ballot boxes for 2023 elections on display

summaries.title: 'Wen I see di boys dey go school, e dey pain'
summaries.description: Girls bin no dey allowed to choose subjects such like economics, engineering and journalism for university.

summaries.title: Police kill woman wey open fire for school children for Nashville
summaries.description: Na one 28-year-old woman bin open fire for di private school, wey kill six pipo including three pikins dem.
summaries.imageAlt: foto of ambulance, police and small pikins dem

summaries.title: Tins to do and avoid during Ramadan, all you need sab about di 'holy month'
summaries.description: Muslims all over di world dey ready to start di2023 Ramadan fasting
summaries.imageAlt: Di crescent and star to symbolise ramadan

summaries.title: Silence on London street as family bury woman wey die for Asake concert
summaries.description: Two pipo die for Asake concert for December 2022 as kasala burst wen pipo start to dey crowd enta di sold out show.

summaries.title: Abacha ex-Chief of Staff, Oladipo Diya don die
summaries.description: Late Dipo Diya, na de facto second-in-command to di late Military dictator Sani Abacha during im regime.
summaries.imageAlt: Abacha ex-Chief of Staff, Oladipo Diya don die

summaries.title: Who be di new King?
summaries.description: Charles don become di King. Look back at some of di key moments wey don shape im life.
summaries.imageAlt: King Charles and late Princess Diana

summaries.title: How to vote for Nigeria general election
summaries.description: On Saturday, Nigeria go vote to elect a new president and lawmakers wey go lead di kontri for anoda four years.

summaries.title: Wetin e take to win election for Nigeria
summaries.description: Elections na tricky business all ova di world and e no dey different for Nigeria.
summaries.imageAlt: Wetin e take to win election for Nigeria

summaries.title: Tins you go do during election wey go land you for INEC hot soup
summaries.description: As Nigeria election dey come up, we chook eye for di tins to avoid during election wey fit land you for trouble.

summaries.title: 'We dey good to go for dis election' - INEC Boss
summaries.description: Professor Mahmood Yakubu speak wit BBC on Inec plans to conduct free and fair elections.

summaries.title: Video show moments from Indonesia stadium tragedy wey claim di lives of more dan 170 pipo
summaries.description: More than 170 pipo don die for one stadium disaster for one football match for East Java for Indonesia
summaries.imageAlt: Large crowds on a football pitch

summaries.title: 'Since I pick her my life don change'- Man narrate how im become di guardian of di baby e find for bin
summaries.description:
'As I flash Torchlight for her face I see dat expression of 'finally help don come' for her eyes' 
'Wen I touch her, I see say she need medical attention sharp sharp, na from dat day I turn papa overnight'
See how Ben-Kingsley resignfrom im work to care for baby e pick for road as e turn papa in less dan 24 hours.

summaries.title: 'Every woman suppose get her own money' - Wanneka
summaries.description: CEO of Wanneka Luxury Hair tok to BBC Pidgin about her journey for business plus di controversies wey don follow her recently.

summaries.title: 'E take 15 scans, 20 years of hospital waka to find out my condition'
summaries.description: Elizabeth Amoaa say e take 15 scans, 20 years medication to find out say she get Uterus Didelphys.
summaries.imageAlt: Uterus Didelphys: Elizabeth Amoaa tori about her life wit double uterus and cervix

summaries.title: Meet de 17-year-old wey dey build electric bikes to epp pipo wey dey live with disability
summaries.description: Aboagye dey manufacture electronic motorbikes wey physically challenged people go fit use move around.

summaries.title: Meet de 9-year-old wonder girl who dey repair motorbikes
summaries.description: Susanna Adjarkei Apperkon:Meet de 9-year-old wonder girl who dey repair motorbikes

summaries.title: ‘I marry early to avoid distractions, but I no get issues with polygamous lovers’ - Medikal
summaries.description: Ghanaian celebrity couple, Medikal and Fella Makafui share some moments as soul mates.

summaries.title: Why two out of evri three unemployed pesin for Ghana na woman
summaries.description: Over 1.76 million Ghana pipo bin dey unemployed for di number three quarter of 2022, GSS tok.

summaries.title: Why minority lawmakers for Ghana wan investigate govment officals over illegal mining accusations
summaries.description: President Akufo-Addo in de first term of office announce radical plan to fight illegal gold mining which destroyed most of de water bodies for Ghana.

summaries.title: Nigeria, Ghana, oda African kontris evacuate dia citizens from Sudan
summaries.description: Nigeria, Ghana and oda African kontris don begin evacuate dia citizens from Sudan sake of di crisis wey dey shele for di kontri.
summaries.imageAlt: Nigeria, Ghana, oda African kontris evacuate dia citizens from Sudan

summaries.title: ‘Armed Sudan soldier almost shoot Ghana student who dey shower inside bathroom’
summaries.imageAlt: Pipo wey dey try escape from Sudan

summaries.title: Who be de Ghanaian musician wey sue Canadian rapper Drake for $10 million?
summaries.description: De Ghanaian musician Obrafuor claim say despite not giving copyright clearance, Drake use vocal excerpts of en 2003 song “killer cut, blood, killer cut” on track six of song.
summaries.imageAlt: Drake and im management never respond to all de claims

summaries.title: How 95 stolen luxury vehicles from US and Canada end up for Ghana
summaries.description: In 2019, security operatives intercept over 900 stolen which dem dey try ship into Nigeria and Ghana.
summaries.imageAlt: Ghana turn major destination for stolen luxury vehicles

summaries.title: What be de 10% betting tax wey Ghana pass into law?
summaries.description: Ghana President Akufo-Addo sign three new tax bills wey parliament pass into law and de income tax amendment bill which dey impose 10% tax on lottery and sports betting winnings dey vex de youth.
summaries.imageAlt: Collage of better and anoda man who dey stake bet dey check en slip

summaries.title: Ghana confirm invasion of new mosquito breed wey be ‘stubborn’
summaries.description: Research dey show say dis new mosquito breed go fit put some 126 million people at risk of malaria if e spread.

summaries.title: Ghana be first country to approve ‘world-changer’ malaria vaccine
summaries.description: Food and Drugs Authority for Ghana wey see de data, approve de vaccine for use in children between age five months to three years old.
summaries.imageAlt: Ghana be first country to approve malaria vaccine

summaries.title: ‘Govment no create jobs, but dem wan collect 10% tax if I cash out from bet’
summaries.description: Investors feel de move by govment be totally unfair sake of most of de time dem dey lose dia bets, so collecting tax when dem win once a while be wrong.
summaries.imageAlt: Ghana you dey vex over 10% tax on bet winnings

summaries.title: How de new Gh1 digital transport fee dey worry Ghanaians who dey use Bolt, Uber and others
summaries.description: Ride-hailing apps for Ghana explain say de decision to introduce digital transport fee dey come from de Driver Vehicle and Licensing Authority (DVLA).
summaries.imageAlt: Ghana start dey charge digital transport fee

summaries.title: Inflation, cedi depreciation and oda harsh conditions which dey kill local businesses for Ghana
summaries.imageAlt: Businesses for Ghana dey complain of hardships

summaries.title: How Man City hold Real Madrid to draw first leg of Champions League semifinal
summaries.description: Two heavyweight clubs meet each oda for di first leg of di Champions League Semifinal.

summaries.title: Reactions afta Osimhen goal lead Napoli to first Serie A title win in 33 years
summaries.description: Napoli win dia first Serie A title for 33 years as dem play draw wit Udinese to spark celebrations back in Naples.

summaries.title: Forbes top ten list of highest paid athletes for 2023 and wetin dem earn
summaries.description: Di top three highest-paid athletes for di world of sports for di past 12 months na footballers, according to di 2023 list wey Forbes publish.

summaries.title: Messi PSG career don end afta club suspension?
summaries.description: Lionel Messi chop two weeks suspension from Paris St-Germain for missing training to travel to Saudi Arabia.

summaries.title: 2-year-old NFL player daughter drown for family swimming pool
summaries.description: Police tok say di youngest daughter of linebacker Shaquil Barrett bin fall for di family Florida pool,
summaries.imageAlt: NFL linebacker dey celebrate during one game.

summaries.title: Premier League title dey our hands now - Guardiola
summaries.description: Man City beat leaders Arsenal 4-1 for Etihad Stadium, and now dey two points behind dem wit two games in hand.

summaries.title: Firminho goal wound Arsenal Premier League hope
summaries.description: Arsenal players fall yakata for ground in disappointment wen Firmino reach di far post to head in di perfect delivery from Alexander-Arnold.
summaries.imageAlt: Firminho goal wound Arsenal Premier League hope

summaries.title: Man City vs Arsenal prediction, teams news & kick off
summaries.description: Leaders Arsenal and defending champions Manchester City go meet for a title showdown match on Wednesday

summaries.title: Wetin dey happun for Tottenham afta Newcastle flog dem 6-1?
summaries.description: In theory, Tottenham get chance to finish for Champions League place, although in reality, afta di kasala for St James Park, pipo no really believe say e fit happun.

summaries.title: How Arsenal come from behind to draw with Southampton for Emirates
summaries.description: Arsenal kwanta wit Southampton for di Emirate stadium. Di Gunners bin dey hope to extend dia lead for di Premier League table as dem continue dia title chase.

summaries.title: Champions League semi-final teams, fixtures & dates
summaries.description: Di 2022/23 semi final fixtures of dis season champions league dey scheduled to take place for May.

summaries.title: Bayern vs Man City: Champions League prediction & match details
summaries.description: Bayern Munich go play Manchester City for di return leg of dia quarterfinal match for champions league on Wednesday.
